printings.flavor: In Ravnica's wilder districts, nature still stirs, and its protectors still mind their posts.

Savageborn Hydra.name: Savageborn Hydra
Savageborn Hydra.text:
Double strike
Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

Scab-Clan Giant.name: Scab-Clan Giant
Scab-Clan Giant.text: When Scab-Clan Giant enters the battlefield, it fights target creature an opponent controls chosen at random.

printings.flavor: For the Gruul, bone-crushing rage is the first priority. Accuracy comes in a distant ninetieth.

Scion of Vitu-Ghazi.name: Scion of Vitu-Ghazi
Scion of Vitu-Ghazi.text: When Scion of Vitu-Ghazi enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

Selesnya Cluestone.name: Selesnya Cluestone
Selesnya Cluestone.text:
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
{G}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Selesnya Cluestone: Draw a card.

printings.flavor:
"Break it if you must. The loss of one relic is nothing next to the value of enriching us all."
—Suniel the Woodwise

Serve.name: Serve
Serve.text:
Target creature gets -6/-0 until end of turn.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Showstopper.name: Showstopper
Showstopper.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature an opponent controls."

printings.flavor: The audience quickly realized a few things: it wasn't a magic trick, there wasn't candy in there, and they'd need new clothes.

Simic Cluestone.name: Simic Cluestone
Simic Cluestone.text:
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Simic Cluestone: Draw a card.

printings.flavor: Simic symbols are among the most intricate and fragile, yet few vandalize them for fear of the strange lifeforms that might be released.

Sin Collector.name: Sin Collector
Sin Collector.text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

printings.flavor: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

Sinister Possession.name: Sinister Possession
Sinister Possession.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 2 life.

printings.flavor:
"You caught something on a cold night's stroll? No, I'd say something caught you."
—Mezim Magrah, civic healer

Sire of Insanity.name: Sire of Insanity
Sire of Insanity.text: At the beginning of each end step, each player discards his or her hand.

printings.flavor: Its victims become mindless lunatics. Conveniently, that's the first step in joining the Cult of Rakdos.

Skylasher.name: Skylasher
Skylasher.text:
Flash
Skylasher can't be countered.
Reach, protection from blue

printings.flavor:
"It preys on those who would spy on our lands, so we never prey on it."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers.name: Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers
Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers.text: When Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

Species Gorger.name: Species Gorger
Species Gorger.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

printings.flavor:
"We raised eelhawks to control the squidflies, then waspcrabs to prey on the eelhawks. Now what do we do with all these waspcrabs?"
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer
For the Rakdos, "suicidal charge" and "good showmanship" are one and the same.

"Sometimes it forgets to loosen its grip before taking flight. I lost my roof that way."
—Ecaban, Boros scout

Sunspire Gatekeepers.name: Sunspire Gatekeepers
Sunspire Gatekeepers.text: When Sunspire Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.

printings.flavor: "You will pass with respect, or you will not pass at all."

Tajic, Blade of the Legion.name: Tajic, Blade of the Legion
Tajic, Blade of the Legion.text:
Indestructible
Battalion — Whenever Tajic, Blade of the Legion and at least two other creatures attack, Tajic gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

printings.flavor: "I run the maze alone, but I fight with the full might of the Legion."

Take.name: Take
Take.text:
Remove all +1/+1 counters from target creature you control. Draw that many cards.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Tear.name: Tear
Tear.text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts.name: Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts
Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts.text:
Vigilance, protection from creatures
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature. Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

Thrashing Mossdog.name: Thrashing Mossdog
Thrashing Mossdog.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

Tithe Drinker.name: Tithe Drinker
Tithe Drinker.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

Toil.name: Toil
Toil.text:
Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Trait Doctoring.name: Trait Doctoring
Trait Doctoring.text:
Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another until end of turn.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

Trostani's Summoner.name: Trostani's Summoner
Trostani's Summoner.text: When Trostani's Summoner enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, and a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample onto the battlefield.

Trouble.name: Trouble
Trouble.text:
Trouble deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Turn.name: Turn
Turn.text:
Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a red Weird with base power and toughness 0/1.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Ubul Sar Gatekeepers.name: Ubul Sar Gatekeepers
Ubul Sar Gatekeepers.text: When Ubul Sar Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

printings.flavor: There are many gates into the undercity, but few ways out.

Uncovered Clues.name: Uncovered Clues
Uncovered Clues.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

printings.flavor: The Implicit Maze winds through Ravnica, connecting arcane landmarks of all ten guilds.

Unflinching Courage.name: Unflinching Courage
Unflinching Courage.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.

printings.flavor: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

Varolz, the Scar-Striped.name: Varolz, the Scar-Striped
Varolz, the Scar-Striped.text:
Each creature card in your graveyard has scavenge. The scavenge cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to that card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Varolz, the Scar-Striped.

Viashino Firstblade.name: Viashino Firstblade
Viashino Firstblade.text:
Haste
When Viashino Firstblade enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

printings.flavor:
"All that steel doesn't make them slower. It makes them bolder."
—Tajic, Blade of the Legion

Voice of Resurgence.name: Voice of Resurgence
Voice of Resurgence.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, put a green and white Elemental creature token onto the battlefield with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

Vorel of the Hull Clade.name: Vorel of the Hull Clade
Vorel of the Hull Clade.text: {G}{U}, {T}: For each counter on target artifact, creature, or land, put another of those counters on that permanent.

printings.flavor: "I used to hurl rocks and eat scraps of meat burned over a fire. Look at what I've become and tell me Simic does not hold infinite possibility."

Wake the Reflections.name: Wake the Reflections
Wake the Reflections.text: Populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

printings.flavor:
"You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army."
—Lalia, Selesnya dryad

Warleader's Helix.name: Warleader's Helix
Warleader's Helix.text: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

printings.flavor:
"There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them."
—Aurelia

Warped Physique.name: Warped Physique
Warped Physique.text: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

printings.flavor: The Gruul seek unbounded strength. The Dimir deliver cruel irony.

Weapon Surge.name: Weapon Surge
Weapon Surge.text:
Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Wear.name: Wear
Wear.text:
Destroy target artifact.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Well.name: Well
Well.text:
You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

Willing.name: Willing
Willing.text:
Creatures you control gain deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

printings.flavor: Air currents whip through the city corridors, creating wind tunnels that accelerate urban drakes toward their prey.

Woodlot Crawler.name: Woodlot Crawler
Woodlot Crawler.text:
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
Protection from green

printings.flavor:
"We learned something from the Simic. Unfortunately for them."
—Nefara, Dimir agent

Zhur-Taa Ancient.name: Zhur-Taa Ancient
Zhur-Taa Ancient.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

printings.flavor: Many Ravnicans think of nature as orderly groves and elf-tended rot farms. They haven't seen the Gruul wilds.

Zhur-Taa Druid.name: Zhur-Taa Druid
Zhur-Taa Druid.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

printings.flavor: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."
